original_text: They answered, “We’ll be glad to give them.” So they spread out a garment, and each of them threw a ring from his plunder onto it.
korean_text: 무리가 대답하되 우리가 즐거이 드리리이다 하고 겉옷을 펴고 각기 탈취한 귀고리를 그 가운데에 던지니

sentences.original_text: We'll be glad to give them
So they spread out a garment
and each of them threw a ring

sentences.korean_translation: 자기가 약탈한 것 중에서 그 위로
